name: Segestica
description:
Segestica is a low poly resource management on click survivor game where you have to gather enough resources food, wood, water, gold, weapons, magic and manpower to be able to defend yourself from the attack of the Romans who surrounded your town. 

Segestica  was created in 5 days period during Unity education at PISMO Novska

Programer : Vedran Živković

Art:  Vedran Živković

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski
